column2: Amaterasu Defied

Tenno [From.GetFirstName] has died without an heir. While [From.GetSheHe] was a mortal [From.GetManWoman] like any other and [From.GetHerHis] death thus was to be expected sooner or later, the lack of a member of the Imperial Family to inherit the Chrysanthemum Throne is unprecedented, seeing as the Imperial Family has possessed it since time immemorial.\n\nWith the succession unclear, Tenno [From.GetFirstName]'s former realm has crumbled, and the belief of many of the Shinto faithful has crumbled alongside it, with many abandoning their faith altogether.
The unthinkable has happened!
I suppose Buddhism has its appeal...
I suppose Shugendo has its appeal...
I suppose Koshin has its appeal...
It is time for me to openly convert...
So much for "Ten thousand years!"...
As the new Tenno, I need to decide on a regnal name to use.
I will be known as Jimmu!
I will be known as Suizei!

Excellent!
